verses.name: Romans 15:1
verses.text: We then that are strong ought to bear the infirmities of the weak, and not to please ourselves.

verses.name: Romans 15:2
verses.text: Let every one of us please his neighbour for his good to edification.

verses.name: Romans 15:3
verses.text: For even Christ pleased not himself; but, as it is written, The reproaches of them that reproached thee fell on me.

verses.name: Romans 15:4
verses.text: For whatsoever things were written aforetime were written for our learning, that we through patience and comfort of the scriptures might have hope.

verses.name: Romans 15:5
verses.text: Now the God of patience and consolation grant you to be likeminded one toward another according to Christ Jesus:
